title: What websites can I publish my article? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many websites on which you can publish your articles. AirTract: It is a free platform to publish your articles. It also lets you write a blog of your own. It is a user-friendly site where you can ask and answer questions. It lets you write articles on many latest topics as well as general topics. Publishing your articles here is easy and does not require much prior knowledge. EzineArticles: It is an online content publishing platform. It expects the authors to send 250-25000 education-based articles. Publishing articles here is easy here, without big investments. Also, you can submit your articles from home. You get to build your own social media. There are three formats in which you can send your articles here - the text format, the HTML format, and the PDF format. EasyArticle: It is a platform that publishes all sorts of articles. Articles that you create here can also be shared on all your social media accounts. It also offers you the feature of auto-saving, in case you lose progress. Also, you can use any editor of your choice such as JCE, CodeMirror. Hubpages: This is a great platform to share your articles with. You can create articles on a wide range of topics. Also, you can interact with fellow users and ask questions from them. You can also give your views on the content published by other authors. By submitting your articles here, you can also generate revenue.

You mentioned “article” first, and then “novel”. I will address them both. If you write articles you’d like to publish, then I recommend Medium. If you are writing a novel and you want to serialize it for publication, then I recommend Wattpad. I hope this helps.
